page.title: 15SERVICES
page.content: The main means of transport is the bus.There are two main bus depots at Hawick and Kelso.There is also a daily postal service and a post bus operated from Hawick.Our nearest railway stations are Berwick,Edinburgh and Carlisle.The only way to ship goods is by lorryso many lorries pass through our district daily.People rely on their own private cars.There are two garages one with petrol and one which does repair work.There are several shops including hairdresser,butcher, sadeller,knitwear shop,two general stores and a post office.We have a small sewage works just outside the village.There are telephone boxes in Minto and Denholm.Denholm has a Primary School.A travelling libary visits every two weeks.There is also a Church of Scotland.The nearest medical services are in Hawick and Jedburgh.
